bug.author: p4jos
bug.summary: Bad links to models in "Models" page
bug.description: In Models page (accessed through "View details") when clicked on model name the resulting page is not found. The URL is localhost/jobID and I guess it should be localhost/models/jobID as then it works as expected.

comments.comment: Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/p4jos>@p4jos</denchmark-link> ! This one probably slipped through the net when <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/pull/507>#507</denchmark-link> was merged. I have pushed PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/pull/568>#568</denchmark-link> for this.
